article_title: Smooth Rollout For New ICD-10 Medical Codes, Insurers Say

article_metadata.description: The launch of tens of thousands of new government-mandated “ICD-10” codes used to describe diseases and hospital procedures in the billing process has seen few problems in the early days of its launch, large health insurers say. The news of a smooth rollout thus far comes from Humana (HUM) and UnitedHealth Group [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
